subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Without Chauncey Billups and with Amar’e Stoudemire coping with a sore back, the Knicks did not have the manpower to defeat Rajon Rondo and the Celtics in Game 3.
snippet: Without Chauncey Billups and with Amar’e Stoudemire coping with a sore back, the Knicks did not have the manpower to defeat Rajon Rondo and the Celtics in Game 3.
